column1: '''Worldcon''' - the ''' World Science Fiction Convention''' is the annual science fiction convention of the '''World Science Fiction Society''' ('''WSFS'''). It has been held each year since 1939 (except for the years 1942 to 1945
column2: during World War II). The members of each Worldcon are the members of WSFS
column3: and vote both to select the site of the Worldcon two years later
column4: and to select the winners of the annual Hugo Awards
column5: which are presented at each convention.<ref>Worldcon at Wikipedia http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Worldcon (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>
